Format x16b - 16 bit(s) 110
AE_L16UI.N 010 1101
t 3210
s 3210
ae_fld_Inst16b_12 0

Assembler Syntax

AE_L16UI.N a0..15(art), a0..15(ars), 0..2

C Syntax

#include <xtensa/tie/xt_hifi2.h>

extern unsigned short AE_L16UI_N(const unsigned short * ars, immediate i);

Description

AE_L16UI.N is a specialized version of the core L16UI instruction with immediate restricted to the offsets 0 or 2.

Implementation Pipeline

In Out
ars Estage art Mstage

Protos that use AE_L16UI.N

proto AE_L16UI.N { out uint16 art, in const uint16 * ars, in immediate i }{}{
AE_L16UI.N art, ars, i + 0;
}
